short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension for Netflix display's IMDB's rating of individual movie on every screen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
General features:

- Extension can show IMDB rating on thumbnail image.
- Extension can store rating in localstorage for reducing loading delay.
